title: Investor Michael Burry Reveals Options Bet Against Oracle
description: Michael Burry, the famed investor who has drawn attention in recent months for criticism of the artificial intelligence boom, is betting against Oracle Corp.

title: Google adds new AI feature, turning Gmail into assistant
description: More artificial intelligence is being implanted into Gmail as Google tries to turn the world’s most popular email service into a personal assistant that can improve writing, summarize far-flung information buried in inboxes and deliver daily to-do lists. The new AI features announced Thursday could herald a pivotal moment for Gmail, a service that transformed […]
content: More artificial intelligence is being implanted into Gmail as Google tries to turn the world’s most popular email service into a personal assistant that can improve writing, summarize far-flung information buried in inboxes and deliver daily to-do li... [1302 chars]

title: View AI as a collaborator, Turing awardee Ullman tell students

title: DOJ creates task force to challenge state AI regulations
description: A new group within the Justice Department will target state artificial intelligence laws that it says hinder innovation, according to a memo.
content: The Justice Department on Friday announced to employees it is creating an artificial intelligence taskforce to challenge state-level regulations so that AI companies can "be free to innovate without cumbersome regulation," according to an internal me... [2119 chars]

title: Can AI Shape India's Next Leap in Human Development?
description: Dr. Rahul Kundal rahulkundal@uok.edu.in As Artificial Intelligence (AI) reshapes industries and social systems, India stands at a critical juncture. Recognised as a future AI powerhouse and lauded for its human development progress, the country now faces an essential question: Will AI serve as an engine of inclusive growth, or will it widen the gaps we’ve struggled to narrow? The Human Development Report (HDR) 2025 highlights the urgency of this dilemma. It calls for a revived interest on human agency and […]
content:
Dr. Rahul Kundal
rahulkundal@uok.edu.in

title: Meta announces nuclear energy projects to support AI innovation
description: Tech powerhouse Meta is working to expand artificial intelligence innovation and development with the help of a particular energy source: nuclear power.
content:
WASHINGTON (Gray DC) - Friday morning, tech powerhouse Meta announced a series of projects to expand and advance three key nuclear power plants in Ohio and Pennsylvania, with a goal of then using that energy to power AI innovation.
